Action - Interface in org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes.menus
Simple action listener interface used in the menu system.
addAction(Action) - Method in class org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes.menus.Button
 
addButton(String, Action, String) - Method in class org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes.MenuScene
Places a button in the menuItem list, and automatically calculates the next y-coordinate based on the height of this element and the previous y-coordinate.
addFrame(int, int, int) - Method in class org.fridlund.javalabra.game.sprites.Animation
Adds a new frame to the animation list.
addLabel(String, String) - Method in class org.fridlund.javalabra.game.scenes.MenuScene
Places a non-clickable label in the menuItem list, and automatically calculates the next y-coordinate based on the height of this element and the previous y-coordinate.

Adds a new Scene to the map.

applyModelViewMatrix(boolean) - Method in class org.fridlund.javalabra.game.cameras.Camera
